    • drawXAxis

      public static void drawXAxis(Graphics2D g2d, int width, int height, double min, double max, int axisY, int leftPadding, int rightPadding, Color[] theme)
      Draws the X-axis with ticks and labels
      Parameters:
      g2d - Graphics2D object
      width - Panel width
      height - Panel height
      min - Minimum data value
      max - Maximum data value
      axisY - Y-coordinate to draw the axis
      leftPadding - Left padding
      rightPadding - Right padding
      theme - Color theme

    • drawYAxis

      public static void drawYAxis(Graphics2D g2d, int width, int height, int maxValue, int axisX, int bottomPadding, int topPadding, int rightPadding, Color[] theme, String label)
      Draws the Y-axis with ticks and labels
      Parameters:
      g2d - Graphics2D object
      width - Panel width
      height - Panel height
      maxValue - Maximum frequency or value
      axisX - X-coordinate to draw the axis
      bottomPadding - Bottom padding
      topPadding - Top padding
      rightPadding - Right padding
      theme - Color theme
      label - Optional axis label

    • valueToX

      public static int valueToX(double val, double min, double range, int drawingWidth, int leftPadding)
      Converts a data value to its X coordinate in a drawing area
      Parameters:
      val - Data value
      min - Minimum value of the dataset
      range - Range (max - min) of the dataset
      drawingWidth - Available drawing width
      leftPadding - Left padding
      Returns:
      X coordinate

    • freqToY

      Converts a frequency value to its Y coordinate for bar heights
      Parameters:
      val - Frequency count
      height - Panel height
      maxFreq - Maximum frequency
      Returns:
      Y coordinate

      public static int calcValueToX(double val, double min, double max, int leftPadding, int rightPadding, int width)
      Calculates an X coordinate for cumulative graphs
      Parameters:
      val - Data value
      min - Minimum value
      max - Maximum value
      leftPadding - Left padding
      rightPadding - Right padding
      width - Total drawing width
      Returns:
      X coordinate

    • percentToY

      public static int percentToY(double percent, int height, int topPadding, int bottomPadding)
      Converts a percentage (0 to 1) to a Y coordinate for cumulative frequency graphs
      Parameters:
      percent - Cumulative percentage
      height - Panel height
      topPadding - Top padding
      bottomPadding - Bottom padding
      Returns:
      Y coordinate

      y - Starting Y position
      theme - Color theme
